mapper.select:
SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title,
r.host_user_email AS hostUserEmail,
u.nickname,
r.room_img AS roomImg, r.start_date AS startDate, r.max_participants AS maxParticipants,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_join_request rjr WHERE rjr.room_id = r.room_id AND rjr.status = '승인' ) AS currentParticipants,
r.deadline, r.gender, r.created_at AS createdAt,
CASE WHEN c.level = 1 THEN c.name WHEN c.level = 2 THEN c.name WHEN c.level = 3 THEN mid.name END AS midCategoryName,
CASE WHEN c.level = 3 THEN c.name ELSE NULL END AS subCategoryName
FROM room r JOIN users u ON r.host_user_email = u.email LEFT JOIN category c ON r.categoryId = c.id LEFT JOIN category mid ON c.parent_id = mid.id
WHERE r.status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET status = 'CLOSED' WHERE deadline < CURDATE() AND status = 'OPEN'
UPDATE room r SET r.status = 'CLOSED' WHERE r.status = 'OPEN' AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_join_request rjr WHERE rjr.room_id = r.room_id AND rjr.status = '승인' ) >= r.max_participants
